racial_traits.name: Slow and Steady
racial_traits.description: Your base speed is never modified by armor or encumbrance.

racial_traits.name: Darkvision
racial_traits.description: Dwarves can see perfectly in the dark up to 60 feet.

racial_traits.name: Defensive Training
racial_traits.description: Dwarves gain a +4 dodge bonus to AC against monsters of the giant subtype.

racial_traits.name: Dwarven Weapon Familiarity
racial_traits.description: Dwarves are proficient with battleaxes, heavy picks, and warhammers, and treat any weapon with the word “dwarven” in its name as a martial weapon.

racial_traits.name: Greed
racial_traits.description: Dwarves gain a +2 racial bonus on Appraise checks made to determine the price of non-magical goods that contain precious metals or gemstones.

racial_traits.name: Hardy
racial_traits.description: Dwarves gain a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against poison, spells, and spell-like abilities.

racial_traits.name: Hatred
racial_traits.description: Dwarves gain a +1 racial bonus on attack rolls against humanoid creatures of the orc and goblinoid subtypes because of their special training against these hated foes.

racial_traits.name: Stability
racial_traits.description: Dwarves gain a +4 racial bonus to their Combat Maneuver Defense when resisting a bull rush or trip attempt while standing on the ground.

racial_traits.name: Stonecunning
racial_traits.description: Dwarves gain a +2 bonus on Perception checks to notice unusual stonework, such as traps and hidden doors located in stone walls or floors. They receive a check to notice such features whenever they pass within 10 feet of them, whether or not they are actively looking.

racial_traits.name: Low-light Vision
racial_traits.description: Elves can see twice as far as humans in conditions of dim light.

racial_traits.name: Elven Immunities
racial_traits.description: Elves are immune to magic sleep effects and gain a +2 racial saving throw bonus against enchantment spells and effects.

racial_traits.name: Elven Magic
racial_traits.description: Elves receive a +2 racial bonus on caster level checks made to overcome spell resistance. In addition, elves receive a +2 racial bonus on Spellcraft skill checks made to identify the properties of magic items.

racial_traits.name: Elven Weapon Familiarity
racial_traits.description: Elves are proficient with longbows (including composite longbows), longswords, rapiers, and shortbows (including composite shortbows), and treat any weapon with the word “elven” in its name as a martial weapon.

racial_traits.name: Keen Senses
racial_traits.description: Elves receive a +2 racial bonus on Perception checks.

racial_traits.name: Fearless
racial_traits.description: Halflings receive a +2 racial bonus on all saving throws against fear. This bonus stacks with the bonus granted by halfling luck.

racial_traits.name: Halfling Luck
racial_traits.description: Halflings receive a +1 racial bonus on all saving throws.

racial_traits.name: Halfling Weapon Familiarity
racial_traits.description: Halflings are proficient with slings and treat any weapon with the word “halfling” in its name as a martial weapon.

racial_traits.name: Keen Senses
racial_traits.description: Halflings receive a +2 racial bonus on Perception checks.

racial_traits.name: Sure-Footed
racial_traits.description: Halflings receive a +2 racial bonus on Acrobatics and Climb checks.

racial_traits.name: +2 Bonus to One Ability Score
racial_traits.description: Humans gain +2 to the Ability Score of their choice.

racial_traits.name: Bonus Feat
racial_traits.description: Humans select one extra feat at 1st level.

racial_traits.name: Skilled
racial_traits.description: Humans gain an additional skill rank at first level and one additional rank whenever they gain a level.
